item.title: Database Projects - Tue Jul 01 13:07:27 UTC 2025
item.description:

item.title: Trace Recorder - Fri Jul 25 12:40:48 UTC 2025
item.description:
Trace Recorder is a tool that allows you to record and replay the execution trace of your program. This is an alpha release of the plugin. Some bugs and problems are...

item.title: Algo Debugger - Tue Jul 15 08:41:49 UTC 2025
item.description:
The plugin aims to enhance the experience of debugging data structures and algorithms by providing a visual representation of the program's execution data.
vendor: JetBrains s.r.o. downloads: 30 pricingModel: FREE xmlId: org.jetbrains.debugger.algo

item.title: Robo Support - Mon Jul 28 12:06:43 UTC 2025
item.description:
Provides support for Robo, a PHP task runner. The following features are available: Robo run configuration Robo tasks tool window Run line markers for Robo tasks.
vendor: JetBrains s.r.o. downloads: 15 pricingModel: FREE xmlId: com.jetbrains.php.robo
